Name: Smart Thief
About the game: / Smart Thief is a 3rd person theft simulator where you are in the role of an amateur robber who steals every night from differents houses/markets. Each object is guarded by at least one guard. In order to be harder to be found, a box comes to your help to be able to hide from the guards. Be quick and sneaky and grab tons of goods! Watch out for the guards and become the king of thieves! So your goal is to come every night in different houses and to steal all the objects from them. And how no mission is easy, each house will be guarded by guards, and in case you have to hide from them, you will use a box to hide in it. Game features: - Lot of levels to grab tons of goods! - Unique gameplay and game mechanics! - Great soundtrack
